When: You should _already_ know! It's on April 29 - May 1!
HackUPC starts on April 29th at 5PM and ends at 5PM on the 1st of May :timer_clock:
Where: HackUPC is celebrated in UPC Campus Nord :world_map: See https://goo.gl/maps/usj7JrdQgfx
HackUPC takes place at FIB, UPC Campus Nord, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, Europe, World, Solar System, Milky Way, Universe. :smirk: (41°23'20.2"N 2°06'48.5"E)
Sunny Barcelona is the location of HackUPC :sunny:
Schedule: You can find all the schedule on our live page: https://live.hackupc.com/schedule
